questions.question: Which reaction is appropriate when you lose?

choices.answer: Tell the coach the other team cheated
Tell the winners good job
Cry, scream, and kick
Never play that game again

questions.question: Which reaction is appropriate when you win?

choices.answer: Tell the losing team they really stink at this
Sing "We are the Champions"
Tell the losing team good job, that was a tough game
Chant "We won, we won"

questions.question: What do you do if someone on your team is slower than you?

choices.answer: Shout "Hurry up, slowpoke!"
Be patient and encouraging
Just take their turn and do it
Tell everybody "Well, we're going to lose for sure now."

questions.question: What reaction is appropriate if you are the fastest person on your team?

choices.answer: Tell your teammates "Told you so!"
Declare yourself the best of all
Tell your teammates "I'm too good for this. I'm going pro."
Tell your teammates "Good job!" because it is a team effort

questions.question: What should you do if your partner trips and falls?

choices.answer: Laugh out loud
Help them up and finish the game
Walk away
Say to yourself "Are you kidding me?"

questions.question: Which reaction is appropriate if you fall or get hurt?

choices.answer: Lay on the ground and try to be invisible
Ask for a re-do
Go home
Tell a teacher or coach if it is serious

questions.question: When should you just shake it off?

choices.answer: If you trip but are not hurt badly
If you hit your head
If you are bleeding
If you can't breathe

questions.question: What does the phrase "there is no I in TEAM" mean?

choices.answer: I can't be part of a team
The word team is not spelled with an I
If you add t+e+a+m it does not equal I
It means everyone on the team is as important as you are

questions.question: Which words would be most encouraging to someone else?

choices.answer: I'm better at this than you!
Wow, is that all you got?
You got this, give it your best shot!
Come on man!

questions.question: Which gesture is appropriate to use when congratulating someone?

choices.answer: Rub their head and mess up their hair
Shake hands or high five
Stick your tongue out at them
Roll your eyes at them
